meanings.definition: Having the most characteristics of a goat.
meanings.sent1: The farm had the goatiest animals with their long horns and furry coats.
meanings.sent2: She wore a goatiest costume for the school play, complete with hooves and a tail.
meanings.sent3: The goatiest puppet in the show kept eating all the props!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the goatiest sound, high-pitched and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The goatiest smell in the barn was a mix of hay and musk.

meanings.definition: Showing the most resemblance to a goat.

meanings.sent3: The goatiest hat she owned had little horns on the sides.
meanings.sent4: The old man's wisdom had a goatiest quality, like he knew all the secrets of the mountains.
